duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell primary and ancillary communications solutions to small and medium-sized businesses within a specified territory.
Provide subject matter expertise (Product Knowledge, Systems Knowledge, Sales Process Knowledge) within the sales team and mentor other employees on the team.
Achieve sales and revenue goals through successful prospecting for new customers as well as the successful sale of bundled services to new customers.
Generate all sales leads through a variety of prospecting tactics and work every lead from initial contact to sale.
Develop and implement a Territory Plan to expand the customer base within the assigned territory.
Be 100% focused on generating new Internet, voice, and video customers.
Place orders through order management software and ensure all necessary administrative work necessary to support sales activities are accurate and submitted in a timely manner.
Maintain accurate records of all sales and prospecting activities including the use of Salesforce.com to maximize territory potential.
Meet and exceed performance standards as defined by the department and attend and participate in sales meetings as established by management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, marketing or related field, or equivalent experience
